text: I'm Barack Obama and I approve this message.
...where Mitt Romney says he's a friend of coal country?
This is the guy who wants to keep tax breaks for companies that ship American jobs overseas.
The same guy who had a Swiss bank account...
..and millions in tax havens like Bermuda and the Caymans.
And on coal, well, here's what he said as governor outside of coal fire power plant.
I will not create jobs or hold jobs that kill people.
